title: Terms of Surrender
description: First—she'd left without a word.Second—he hadn't chased her down.Now they had to face their past under heated circumstances. And SWAT team hostage negotiators Jolie Conrad and Dace Recker couldn't let their simmering feelings explode. Because they'd suddenly become partners—and targets for a thwarted felon with revenge on the brain.Staying alive would push them to the limit—but staying away from each other might just push them over the edge….
author: Kylie Brant
